description: Rada Miskovic decides to leak confidential Council dossiers, targeting the legitimacy of the regime rather than BCI scoring mechanics. She contacts a trusted Council aide for access, ensuring the files include evidence of manipulated promotions, personal betrayals, and internal warnings.

Encrypted dossier excerpts are distributed through journalist networks, hinting at deep corruption within Council selection and internal power games. Trusted colleagues confirm contents are authentic and prepare coordinated release.

Full Council dossiers are published on city-wide channels. Citizens discover proof of algorithmic manipulation, past infractions covered by the system, and warnings about loyalty risks. Public outrage mounts as calls for resignation and direct elections intensify.

Council meetings descend into chaos as exposed members trade accusations and scramble for support. Factional divides sharpen, with Directorate hardliners demanding cracks down while Innovators push for review and transparency.

Citywide protests grow, focusing on Council offices and demanding immediate resignations and new governance. Council's legitimacy is in doubt, with members forced into seclusion as the system’s data-driven legacy sparks debates about the future of Stenograd.
